name: Asteroids: The Final Frontier
description:
Hello there dear player! Welcome to Asteroids: The Final Frontier, a fast-paced and intense infinite side-scroller. Oh but dont worry its not that infinite. You won't last long when the going gets tough.

Asteroids: The Final Frontier is heartfelt remake of the classic arcade game of which the game's name derives  from. It is slightly different and is made to attract the modern PC gamer with simple, yet engaging game play.

Features:

1) A full myriad of UFOs and Asteroids to make the game intense and fulfilling.

2) A high score system to prove to your friends that your the best rocket pilot in the history of gaming.

3) A difficulty over time system so that the going gets tough and you end up well...dead.

4) An in game tutorial to take you from a rookie to an asteroids destroying fanatic.

5) Power ups to increase your chance of getting a new high score!

Recommended Hardware:
CPU: Any Celeron or Pentium should work. The game was tested on the intel I3-3110M and got 120+ FPS

GPU: Any integrated GPU should work. The game was tested with 64 MB VRAM and had no lag spikes or FPS drops

RAM: 2GB  ram should work without lag or FPS drops. The game was tested on 4GB DDR4 RAM and worked at 120+ FPS

Storage: The required amount is 103 MB and the recommended amount is anything above 103 MB
